hard_constraints.description: Now class, remember that two physical objects cannot occupy the same space at once! We must ensure that every specific room, time slot, and day combination has no more than one workshop assigned to it.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- scheduled(W1, R, S, D), scheduled(W2, R, S, D), W1 != W2.

hard_constraints.description: To keep things manageable for the building staff, we must not overwork a single room. Please ensure each room is used for a maximum of two workshops on any given day.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: {scheduled(W, R, S, D) : workshop(W), slot(S)} 2 :- room(R), day(D).

hard_constraints.description: Pay close attention to the facility schedule: Room 2 is strictly unavailable during the afternoon on both days, so we must avoid scheduling anything there during that time.
AI students are known to be most alert early in the morning! Therefore, you must ensure that AI workshops are never scheduled during the midday or afternoon slots.
The math faculty wants to be able to attend all math-related sessions, so we cannot have two math workshops happening at the same time, even if they are in different rooms.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- scheduled(W1, _, S, D), scheduled(W2, _, S, D), topicOf(W1, "Math"), topicOf(W2, "Math"), W1 != W2.

hard_constraints.description: Due to specific equipment requirements that shouldn't be mixed, if an AI workshop is in a room on a certain day, you must not place a Biology workshop in that same room on that same day.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- scheduled(W1, R, _, D), scheduled(W2, R, _, D), topicOf(W1, "Bio"), topicOf(W2, "AI").

hard_constraints.description: To provide a well-rounded experience for our students, every single day must include at least one session from each of the three topics.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- day(D), topic(T), not scheduled(W, _, _, D) : topicOf(W, T).

soft_constraints.description: While we must follow all the rules, we also want to be as efficient as possible with our space. We should aim to have as few empty room-slots as possible across the entire schedule.
soft_constraints.asp_rule:
used(R, S, D) :- scheduled(_, R, S, D).
idle(R, S, D) :- room(R), slot(S), day(D), not used(R, S, D).
#minimize {1, R, S, D : idle(R, S, D)}.
